description: Erection of first floor level extension and associated change of use from ancillary residential accommodation related to the ground floor Public House to provide 2 x 1 bed flats and 2 x 2 bed flats including ancillary entrance cores, cycle store and refuse store.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed first floor level extension, by virtue of its proximity to surrounding trees, would fail to provide an adequate standard of daylight or outlook for future occupiers and would result in pre and ongoing post development pressure for pruning or removal that would be harmful to their amenity value and contrary to policy 3D.15 (Trees and woodland) of the London Plan (Consolidated with Alterations since 2004), policy CS15 (Open space and green infrastructure) of the Islington Core Strategy 2011, policies Env6 (Protecting trees), D3 (Site planning) and H7 (Standards and guidelines) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, policy 11 of the Tree Policy for Islington document and guidance contained within the Planning Standards Guidelines 2002.
